@coachbenmaxwell Never had an option to moan about it on champ man to be fair.
@coachbenmaxwell Is it not a valid point like?
@coachbenmaxwell @ianmck24 If you read the thread properly you’ll see it starts with a Rangers fan talking about Hibs actually. https://t.co/rDsQVJHy0Q

@ianmck24 We’ll keep a tally? Batter in big man, but I’ll give it a miss. We have continued to progress under Lennon while he’s been here (during all the touchline bans), as long as that continues, he can do as he pleases.
@ianmck24 Pretty sure I never said that was our only claim to being relevant. Touch line ban for noising up you’re lot? Worth it everytime!!

@ianmck24 Love how much we get under your skin. It’s beautiful to watch how much you all take pleasure in Hibs losing. Testament to how much we have improved recently. Please, keep quoting tweets about us while saying we are irrelevant. Cause that’s just contradicting what your saying!

@ianmck24 Beat you twice last season at Ibrox, took you to the last game of the season to see us off for third and beat you in you’re only major final. I’d still say we are fairly relevant. Thanks for keeping up to date with us 😁👍🏽

Wonder how he would describe the 200k bid for Lafferty?
Couldn’t be derisory could it? Na, probably not. https://t.co/nwPpEI2Mci
@ianmck24 Shows how relevant we are to The Rangers fans these days. Rangers fans of old wouldn’t have even checked the Hibs score, let alone quote it in a tweet. Pleasing.
@aztecretro when’s you’re next Hibs release? Must be one of you’re best sellers? Sells out all the time 👀
@Harry1Kong You’re a Hearts fan with a cover photo of Trainspotting. Note, every character was a Hibs fan along with the writer as well. Sort yourself ya melt.
@AlanosLes @HibsNews1875 @ji_2001 You’re on Twitter on a Thursday night baming up Hibs fans with 45 followers and a profile picture of Steven Naismith. Absolute virgin.

@AlanosLes @HibsNews1875 @ji_2001 Aye the money from getting this far and gate receipts are a total waste of time. Was also fuckin horrible finishing 18 points ahead of you to qualify for europe. Total waste of time.

Finishing over the two legs has been honkinand cost us massively. Kamberi been miles off the pace in both games. Definitely need another central midfield before the window closes.
That aside, we got a round further than I thought we would. Been great to watch. Mon the Cabbage 💚

RT @pieandbov: When blog articles go bad.....
https://t.co/O2ZLmLu3nb

@Lmc2105 @KWR07 Couldn’t agree more. Boyle so out of position tonight, couldn’t use his pace and Kamberi looked a yard of the pace. MacLaren has to play and we need more creativity in the middle of the park.
@MichaelLinton27 @hibsboy69 @JamesLu28978099 @Atko__ Very possible, maybe he’s green at heart 😉💚
@MichaelLinton27 @hibsboy69 @JamesLu28978099 @Atko__ Kamara not a free agent so can’t go south. Mulumbu is and can sign for whoever, surprised nobody has moved for him to be honest.

@MichaelLinton27 @hibsboy69 @JamesLu28978099 @Atko__ Yeah, like them all. Kamara would be my pick of the bunch. But would happily take any of them. Mulumbu wants to go south again I believe. Should have some money to try and sway him though.

@hibsboy69 @JamesLu28978099 @MichaelLinton27 @Atko__ Spot on. He’s gave us a threat from midfield, as well as set pieces that we have badly needed. Granted he can improve his tackling, but he’s not been signed for that. I’d happily let him roam if we had two other centre mids to support him. Definitely need one more in.

@JamesLu28978099 @MichaelLinton27 @Atko__ And your telling me that all the attributes they have now they had when they started? No. Doesn’t like a tackle at the moment, but he will soon learn in a Lennon team that’s part and parcel. Once again, he’s been here literally weeks. Played a big part besides tackling.
@JamesLu28978099 @MichaelLinton27 @Atko__ Can’t disagree he’s missing certain parts to his game, but look at other players Lennon has improved. Give the boy time. Season has barely started.

@MichaelLinton27 @JamesLu28978099 @Atko__ We must have said similar about McGinn and McGeough when they both signed. Boy needs time and a genuinely midfield powerhouse next to him to help. Still got time to sort that out. Lennon has never let us down before. Time will tell.
@MichaelLinton27 @JamesLu28978099 @Atko__ His goal threat and wide balls are great. But close passing and creative passing needs work. Still a great player/prospect.
@Atko__ Bartley got full marks for me as well, until he went off he was superb when we were on the back foot. Him and Efe kept us in the tie.
Should have nicked that, but not conceding an away goal gives us a right good sniff in the away leg. With our pace on the counter I fancy us to score. The dream goes on 💚 #GGTTH
@joshcannon93 He’s not what he once was. Still won more trophies at United and finished higher in the league than Klopp has at Liverpool. Back in your cage grim tweeter. https://t.co/F0VpAY4zUs
